verse.name: v1
verse.lines: 'Tis finished! The Messiah dies - cut off for sins, but not His own; accomplished is the sacrifice - the great redeeming work is done.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The veil is rent; in Christ alone the living way to heav'n is seen; the middle wall is broken down, and all mankind may enter in.
